quest.name: Clean Paws Make Good Artists
journal:
Managingway needs soap. Now.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Speak with Removingway in Greatest Endsvale.
Deliver the requested item to Managingway.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Our imaging station is the pride of Hoper's Hold. Is not a Way entitled to the paint of their paws? I, for one, say “Yes!”

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: ...In principle, anyway. So long as that paint doesn't get smeared into fur or dripped from whiskers. Or splashed everywhere. Oh, Forename, we are in desperate need of soap!

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Could you make us some? Please? Just to mop up our more creative and forgetful Ways before they track their artistic ambitions all over the burrow.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Removingway is cleaning up paint in Greatest Endsvale as we speak. Go to them. They are well versed in suds. Please, do hurry!

dialogue.name: SUPPORTER4710
dialogue.text: <blip> Excitedly anticipating soap production.

dialogue.name: REMOVINGWAY
dialogue.text: Forename! And not a moment too soon. Something tells me one more colorful footprint might pickle Managingway's carrots for good.

dialogue.name: REMOVINGWAY
dialogue.text: Here, these materials should yield some strong soap. A capable crafter like you could probably make it blindfolded! ...Though I don't recommend it.

dialogue.name: REMOVINGWAY
dialogue.text: Here, these materials should yield some strong soap. A capable crafter like you could probably make it blindfolded! ...Though I don't recommend it.

dialogue.name: REMOVINGWAY
dialogue.text: Here, these materials should yield some strong soap. A capable crafter like you could probably make it blindfolded! ...Though I don't recommend it.

dialogue.name: REMOVINGWAY
dialogue.text: Take it straight to Managingway once you've finished. The sooner, the better, I'd say. And if your hand slips, this doing supporter should have all you need to start again.

dialogue.name: SUPPORTER04710
dialogue.text: Supply request received. <blip> Oops! You already seem well prepared to make soap. Please make soap. Thank you!

dialogue.name: SUPPORTER04710
dialogue.text: Supply request received. <blip> Oops! You already seem well prepared to make soap. Please make soap. Thank you!

dialogue.name: SUPPORTER04710
dialogue.text: Supply request received. <blip> Oops! You already seem well prepared to make soap. Please make soap. Thank you!

dialogue.name: SUPPORTER04710
dialogue.text: <blip> Your current inventory has been deemed insufficient for the ample production of soap. Tragedy! Please accept these supplies.

dialogue.name: SUPPORTER04710
dialogue.text: <blip> Your current inventory has been deemed insufficient for the ample production of soap. Tragedy! Please accept these supplies.

dialogue.name: SUPPORTER04710
dialogue.text: <blip> Your current inventory has been deemed insufficient for the ample production of soap. Tragedy! Please accept these supplies.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Normal-quality items crafted in the course of this quest serve no purpose and cannot be sold. It is recommended that you discard them.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Have you any soapy succor? I just saw a Way pass by splattered from nose to tail...

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Magnificent! I could kiss you, Forename! ...People express that sentiment at times like these, correct? Baffling, but if it conveys my thanks, I should be glad to share such theoretical intentions.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Our dreams are ever strengthened─and now thoroughly purified─by your efforts. I do hope you will help us again...especially when the soap runs out.
